text: a government plan to address poverty in
Iran has backfired after it was
ridiculed on social media Iran wants to
reduce inflation and the benefits bill
so it decided to give out food baskets
instead of money the handout led to
large queues and chaotic scenes images
of people function to get food and
freezing conditions were shared on
social media people discussed the shame
and humiliation dis brought on Iran many
people were saying on social media that
the distribution system was humiliating
and kind of insulting their intelligence
and the system of the distribution was
not efficient and was not fair the
basket of staples like rice eggs and
cheese was restricted to a targeted
group of people including pensioners
low-income families and government
workers people were disappointed at
rouhani because when rouhani came to
power he promised that he will bring
wealth and dignity to people but many
people thought the way these food
parcels were distributed were just
humiliating and a continuation of former
President Ahmadinejad distributions of
subsidies
you
